name: 30 Seconds (Unevilicorn)
description:
You're stuck in a time loop, and it seems to reset every 30 seconds, Find a way to break out of the loop

Info:

  • Upgrade 1 gives more souls per enemy
  • Upgrade 2 increases speed
  • Upgrade 3 decrease the max time by 1 and increase the speed manipulatively

Goal: 

Reach decrease the max time

Credits:

Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Pictures_of_the_Floating_World/Bumbling
